Simplified manual. Start here!

Source: R/docs.R
tldr.Rd

You don't need to read long manual pages for a simple task. This manual page collects the most common pak use cases.

Package installation

Install a package from CRAN or Bioconductor

pak::pkg_install("tibble")

Install a package from GitHub

pak::pkg_install("tidyverse/tibble")

#>                                                                                 
#> â†’ Will update 2 packages.                                                       
#> â†’ All 2 packages (0 B) are cached.                                              
#> + tibble 3.1.8 â†’ 3.1.8.9001 ğŸ‘·ğŸ¾ğŸ”§ (GitHub: 44d905f)                               
#> + vctrs  0.4.1 â†’ 0.4.1.9000 ğŸ‘·ğŸ»â€â™‚ï¸ğŸ”§ (GitHub: 5191dfc)                            
#> â„¹ No downloads are needed, 2 pkgs are cached                                    
#> âœ” Got vctrs 0.4.1.9000 (source) (2.07 MB)                                       
#> âœ” Got tibble 3.1.8.9001 (source) (1.34 MB)                                      
#> â„¹ Packaging vctrs 0.4.1.9000                                                    
#> âœ” Packaged vctrs 0.4.1.9000 (1.3s)                                              
#> â„¹ Building vctrs 0.4.1.9000                                                     
#> âœ” Built vctrs 0.4.1.9000 (9.7s)                                                 
#> âœ” Installed vctrs 0.4.1.9000 (github::r-lib/vctrs@5191dfc) (29ms)               
#> â„¹ Packaging tibble 3.1.8.9001                                                   
#> âœ” Packaged tibble 3.1.8.9001 (437ms)                                            
#> â„¹ Building tibble 3.1.8.9001                                                    
#> âœ” Built tibble 3.1.8.9001 (2.5s)                                                
#> âœ” Installed tibble 3.1.8.9001 (github::tidyverse/tibble@44d905f) (42ms)         
#> âœ” 1 pkg + 10 deps: kept 8, upd 2, dld 2 (NA B) [17.7s]

Install a package from a URL

pak::pkg_install("url::https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/tibble/tibble_3.1.7.tar.gz")

#>                                                                                 
#> â†’ Will install 1 package.                                                       
#> â†’ Will update 1 package.                                                        
#> â†’ All 2 packages (38.65 kB) are cached.                                         
#> + ellipsis              0.3.2                                                   
#> + tibble   3.1.8.9001 â†’ 3.1.7 ğŸ‘·ğŸ»â€â™€ï¸ğŸ”§                                            
#> â„¹ No downloads are needed, 2 pkgs (38.65 kB) are cached                         
#> âœ” Installed ellipsis 0.3.2  (13ms)                                              
#> â„¹ Building tibble 3.1.7                                                         
#> âœ” Built tibble 3.1.7 (2.5s)                                                     
#> âœ” Installed tibble 3.1.7  (24ms)                                                
#> âœ” 1 pkg + 11 deps: kept 9, upd 1, added 1 [3.4s]

Package updates

Update a package

pak::pkg_install("tibble")

#>                                                                                 
#> â†’ Will update 1 package.                                                        
#> â†’ The package (724.32 kB) is cached.                                            
#> + tibble 3.1.7 â†’ 3.1.8                                                          
#> â„¹ No downloads are needed, 1 pkg (724.32 kB) is cached                          
#> âœ” Installed tibble 3.1.8  (29ms)                                                
#> âœ” 1 pkg + 10 deps: kept 9, upd 1 [572ms]

Update all dependencies of a package

pak::pkg_install("tibble", upgrade = TRUE)

#>                                                                                 
#> â†’ Will update 1 package.                                                        
#> â†’ The package (495.82 kB) is cached.                                            
#> + cli 3.3.0 â†’ 3.4.0 ğŸ‘·ğŸ¼ğŸ”§                                                         
#> â„¹ No downloads are needed, 1 pkg (495.82 kB) is cached                          
#> â„¹ Building cli 3.4.0                                                            
#> âœ” Built cli 3.4.0 (4.6s)                                                        
#> âœ” Installed cli 3.4.0  (35ms)                                                   
#> âœ” 1 pkg + 10 deps: kept 10, upd 1 [5.2s]

Dependency lookup

Dependencies of a CRAN or Bioconductor package

pak::pkg_deps("tibble")

Dependency tree of a CRAN / Bioconductor package

pak::pkg_deps_tree("tibble")

#> tibble 3.1.8 âœ¨                                                                  
#> â”œâ”€fansi 1.0.3 âœ¨                                                                 
#> â”œâ”€lifecycle 1.0.1 âœ¨

#> â”œâ”€pillar 1.8.1 âœ¨                                                                
#> â”‚ â”œâ”€cli 3.4.0 âœ¨ğŸ‘·â€â™€ï¸ğŸ”§                                                            
#> â”‚ â”œâ”€fansi                                                                       
#> â”‚ â”œâ”€glue                                                                        
#> â”‚ â”œâ”€lifecycle                                                                   
#> â”‚ â”œâ”€rlang                                                                       
#> â”‚ â”œâ”€utf8 1.2.2 âœ¨

#> â””â”€vctrs                                                                         
#>                                                                                 
#> Key:  âœ¨ new | ğŸ‘·â€â™€ï¸ build | ğŸ”§ compile

Dependency tree of a package on GitHub

pak::pkg_deps_tree("tidyverse/tibble")

#> tidyverse/tibble 3.1.8.9001 âœ¨ğŸ‘·ğŸ¼â€â™‚ï¸ğŸ”§                                             
#> â”œâ”€fansi 1.0.3 âœ¨

#> â”‚   â”œâ”€cli                                                                       
#> â”‚   â”œâ”€glue

Dependency tree of the package in the current directory

pak::local_deps_tree("tibble")

#> local::tibble 3.1.8 âœ¨ğŸ‘·ğŸ»ğŸ”§                                                        
#> â”œâ”€fansi 1.0.3 âœ¨                                                                 
#> â”œâ”€lifecycle 1.0.1 âœ¨                                                             
#> â”‚ â”œâ”€glue 1.6.2 âœ¨                                                                
#> â”‚ â””â”€rlang 1.0.5 âœ¨                                                               
#> â”œâ”€magrittr 2.0.3 âœ¨                                                              
#> â”œâ”€pillar 1.8.1 âœ¨                                                                
#> â”‚ â”œâ”€cli 3.4.0 âœ¨ğŸ‘·ğŸ»ğŸ”§                                                              
#> â”‚ â”œâ”€fansi                                                                       
#> â”‚ â”œâ”€glue                                                                        
#> â”‚ â”œâ”€lifecycle                                                                   
#> â”‚ â”œâ”€rlang                                                                       
#> â”‚ â”œâ”€utf8 1.2.2 âœ¨                                                                
#> â”‚ â””â”€vctrs 0.4.1 âœ¨                                                               
#> â”‚   â”œâ”€cli                                                                       
#> â”‚   â”œâ”€glue                                                                      
#> â”‚   â””â”€rlang                                                                     
#> â”œâ”€pkgconfig 2.0.3 âœ¨                                                             
#> â”œâ”€rlang                                                                         
#> â””â”€vctrs                                                                         
#>                                                                                 
#> Key:  âœ¨ new | ğŸ‘·ğŸ» build | ğŸ”§ compile

(Assuming package is in directory tibble.)

Explain a recursive dependency

pak::pkg_deps_explain("tibble", "rlang")

#> tibble -> lifecycle -> rlang                                                    
#> tibble -> pillar -> lifecycle -> rlang                                          
#> tibble -> pillar -> rlang                                                       
#> tibble -> pillar -> vctrs -> rlang                                              
#> tibble -> rlang                                                                 
#> tibble -> vctrs -> rlang

Package development

Install dependencies of local package

pak::local_install_deps()

#> âœ” Updated metadata database: 1.42 MB in 5 files.                                
#> â„¹ R 4.2 aarch64-apple-darwin20 packages are missing from Bioconductor           
#> âœ” Updating metadata database ... done                                           
#>                                                                                 
#> â†’ The package (0 B) is cached.                                                  
#> â„¹ No downloads are needed                                                       
#> âœ” 10 deps: kept 10 [7.4s]

Install local package

pak::local_install()

#>                                                                                 
#> â†’ Will update 1 package.                                                        
#> â†’ The package (0 B) is cached.                                                  
#> + tibble 3.1.8 â†’ 3.1.8 ğŸ‘·ğŸ»â€â™€ï¸ğŸ”§                                                   
#> â„¹ No downloads are needed, 1 pkg is cached                                      
#> âœ” Got tibble 3.1.8 (source) (96 B)                                              
#> â„¹ Packaging tibble 3.1.8                                                        
#> âœ” Packaged tibble 3.1.8 (639ms)                                                 
#> â„¹ Building tibble 3.1.8                                                         
#> âœ” Built tibble 3.1.8 (2.2s)                                                     
#> âœ” Installed tibble 3.1.8 (local) (28ms)                                         
#> âœ” 1 pkg + 10 deps: kept 10, upd 1, dld 1 (NA B) [3.9s]

Install all dependencies of local package
